forum.name: Session #6 Reflection: Practice and Closure for EI Content Learning
forum.intro:
Please post your responses to the following reflection questions to this Discussion Forum.
 

Reflection Questions
Considering the Writing a Paragraph lesson as depicted by the SIA videos, and your reflections on practice and closure for EI:
 
  • How well do you think the practice activities helped students understand the organization of a paragraph? What student challenges did the teacher discover during teacher monitoring?

  • Which of the teacher’s actions do you feel were important in conducting these practice activities?  What would you have done differently? Why?

  •  What would you have done next? How would you have moved students to independently writing a paragraph? Include an idea of how soon you would have moved these students to independent writing activities.

  • Given your above answer, how would you have closed this lesson?

To enhance your learning: We encourage you to read and reply to other participants' reflections. Checking back to this forum frequently, or choosing to receive e-mails for this forum, can assist in this process.

 

Once You Have Completed Your Post:

Click on an "Explicit Instruction" link at the top (or at left under "my Courses") to return to the Main Course Outline and access the next course activity.
